original_text: “But when that servant went out, he found one of his fellow servants who owed him a hundred silver coins. He grabbed him and began to choke him. ‘Pay back what you owe me!’ he demanded.
korean_text: 그 종이 나가서 자기에게 백 데나리온 빚진 동료 한 사람을 만나 붙들어 목을 잡고 이르되 빚을 갚으라 하매

sentences.original_text: But when that servant went out
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 종이 밖으로 나갔을 때

sentences.original_text: he found one of his fellow servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 동료 종 중 한 사람을 만났습니다

sentences.original_text: who owed him a hundred silver coins
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기에게 은화 백 데나리온을 빚진 사람이었습니다

sentences.original_text: Pay back what you owe me!
